title: Upcoming Schedule
cleaned_text: Welcome, health and wellbeing are within your reach! Everyone's body has been created to heal. If you are experiencing symptoms of dis-ease then there must be a reason your body has not fixed the issue. I have developed an approach to healing using the vibrational frequencies for ideal health that exist within the human body, I create customized energy-based homeopathic remedies combined with specific energy corrections for my clients. This unique and effective approach is different for each person as everyone is unique. Through muscle testing I ask my client's body what it needs to support health and help the body to "remember" how to heal itself. The body is amazing, and when given what it needs, it has the ability to heal itself! This is wellness care and to get the best benefit I suggest monthly sessions to support you to the best of my ability for your health goals. Just as your car's oil needs changing regularly, maintaining wellness is an ongoing commitment to yourself. The methods I use are safe and effective for anyone in the family, even pets! To read about some experiences my clients have had with Energy Homeopathy, browse
